page.title: 06Converted Oast (Problems)
page.content:
Our garden is big and my dad has had to work hard in it clearing the land to plant some grass and trees. My dad has lots of problems in our oast house making it warm and cosy because of the draught.We have twenty four radiators which cost a lot of money.They are run by oil so we have a tank in the garden.
Why is there a draught?
An oast house has a draught because in the olden days they had a fire in the base of the roundel to dry the hops.To keep the fire going the building was designed to create a draught.
